entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Edmonton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Blatchford 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -26.8°C
Wind: SSE 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
